# Draft:Scream Queens (RuPaul's Drag Race)

| guests         =
| prev           = RuPaul's Big Opening: Part 2
| next           = Shade: The Rusical
| season_article =
| episode_list   =
}}
"Scream Queens" is the third episode of the sixth season of ''RuPaul's Drag Race. It originally aired on March 10, 2014. Linda Blair and Lena Headey are guest judges.
Darienne Lake wins the main challenge. Vivacious is eliminated from the competition after placing in the bottom two and losing a lip-sync against April Carrión to "Shake It Up" by Selena Gomez.
Episode
is eliminated from the competition.]]
The remaining twelve contestants meet for the first time. For the mini-challenge, the contestants pair up and create a beach themed lip-sync. Adore Delano and Milk win the mini-challenge.
For the main challenge, the contestants team up and star in horror film trailers for "Drag Race Me to Hell".
* Team Adore Delano: Adore Delano, April Carrión, BenDeLaCreme, Gia Gunn, Laganja Estranja, and Vivacious
* Team Milk: Bianca Del Rio, Courtney Act, Darienne Lake, Joslyn Fox, Milk, and Trinity K. Bonet
Linda Blair and Lena Headey are guest judges. The runway category is "Best Drag". Team Milk is the winning team, and Darienne Lake wins the challenge. Team Adore Delano is the losing team. Adore Delano, April Carrión, and Vivacious receive negative critiques, and Adore Delano is deemed safe. April Carrión and Vivacious place in the bottom and face off in a lip-sync to "Shake It Up" by Selena Gomez. April Carrión wins the lip-sync and Vivacious is eliminated from the competition.
Reception
Oliver Sava of The A.V. Club'' gave the episode a rating of 'A-'.
